name: HELL-DOKU
description:
Hell-Doku is inspired by classic bullet hell games, but with the added trouble of solving a Sudoku puzzle. A player will run around and fight off waves of pigeons, all while managing the difficult task of solving the well known number puzzle. Try to finish as fast as you can!

This game was created for JJHaggar during the Secret Santa Jam

Pixel Art, Animations, and Programming - EcraepNahte

Sound Design - Sad_Kevin

Game Music - Dark Fantasy Studio: Menu-Planet Hell, Game - Black Hole

Game Sounds - Zero Rare, Sound FX- Retro Pack

Fonts - PixelSplitter

Bullets - M484 Games
